profile: I am a recent graduate with a degree in Computer Science from the Faculty of Computers and Artificial Intelligence, Class of 2024. I specialize in mobile app development using Flutter and have a strong passion for building efficient, cross-platform applications. My experience includes working with Dart, Firebase, and various APIs to create user-friendly and functional apps. I am constantly expanding my knowledge by solving development challenges and sharing insights with the Flutter community. I am driven by a desire to innovate and contribute to impactful projects in the tech industry.
skills: Proficient in Flutter framework and Dart programming language

education.institution: Faculty of Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence, Matrouh University, Egypt

graduationProject.title: Fire Detection System
graduationProject.description: A Flutter mobile app integrated with an IoT device in vehicles to detect fire or smoke, sending real-time alerts to users with push notifications and sound. It also provides sensor status, car location, and fire detection statistics.

certificates.name: Flutter Development Bootcamp
certificates.description: Comprehensive Flutter development course covering widgets, state management, and app deployment

courses.name: Advanced Flutter Development
courses.description: Deep dive into Flutter architecture and advanced concepts

projects.name: Skill Swap
projects.description: A mobile app allowing users to exchange skills and services, built using Flutter and Firebase.

projects.name: Notes App
projects.description: A cross-platform notes application with CRUD operations and integrated cloud storage for data synchronization.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Developed a weather forecasting app that fetches real-time data from an API with an intuitive UI.

projects.name: Bookly App
projects.description: A mobile application helping users discover and read free books online using Flutter.

projects.name: Chat App
projects.description: A real-time chat application built with Flutter and Firebase, featuring messaging and notifications.

projects.name: News App
